aboutpara: Hi there! I'm Avdhoot Patil, a Data Scientist and Software Engineer. Dive into my projects, skills, and experiences to learn more about my journey. I'm currently pursuing my Master's in Data Science at Stony Brook University. I'm also working with the Research Foundation for SUNY as a Research Assistant for Stony Brook Medicine's Long COVID project.

resume.tagline: ðŸ‘‹ I'm a Data Scientist and a Software Engineer.
resume.description: I deliver impactful, scalable solutions by blending data science expertise with software engineering skills. Proficient in Python, machine learning, and web technologies, I am currently pursuing a master's in data science while building cutting-edge Generative AI products.

experiences.position: Software Engineer (Data Science, Cloud, DevOps & MLOps)

description: Enhanced data pipelining processes, improving model development and training efficiency for over 30 Data Scientists by 25%.
Engineered a Python-based framework for seamless model training, deployment, and live servicing using AWS Lambda and API Gateway, reducing model deployment time by 30%.
Designed and implemented end-to-end data pipelines to transfer data from on-premise systems to cloud storage, refining datasets in BigQuery.
Conducted training programs for new team members on GCP, DevOps practices, Git, and workflows, reducing onboarding time by 30%.
Improved backend systems through code optimization and integration of advanced tools, enhancing application performance and maintainability.
Developed and maintained scalable APIs for client projects.
Automated testing pipelines, reducing deployment times by 20%.
